          <title>
            <string language="en">Heat loss from a house</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeverlust von einem Haus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Perte de chaleur d'une maison</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the amount of heat lost through the different parts of a house.</string>
          </description>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la quantité de la

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a quantidade de calor

          </description>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la cantidad de calor
